Once his cover was Blown, Zero flew off to the left and then to the 
right while doing a barrel roll to avoid that blasts fired at him by 
the celebs. He then swooped down towards Barry more while firing 2 
beams of Matrix energy at her, his wings folding around him to 
protect as he headed straight for her.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Stranato took the shoots on an outstretched arm and seemed to like 
the pain. He changed blasters, and this one was also quite small. He 
fired it at Termitron, it traveled quite fast, and the bullet was 
pointy and had a cord attached to it. Stronghold was hit in the hand 
5 times and dropped his blaster. He dove down to pick it up and 
Blender stepped in front of him, making Stronghold no longer visible. 
He was quite a big target. The 10 shots hit him and he made a sound. 
His eyes narrowed and he looked at the hole in his neck where a shot 
had hit him.
> 
> Blender: Hell has relocated.
> 
> Blender throws 3 knives in quick succession at Nightlight.
> 
> Airbomber was hit by 2 of the shots before he flipped out of the 
line of fire and hid behind Train Wreck like the coward that he was...
>
